website_summaries.verdict: The best all-around billiards table cover that lets you show off your NFL team spirit at the same time.
pros: Naugahyde cover offers more abuse resistance and overall protection than most other covers
Easy to fold up and store
Comes with a central NFL logo of most modern teams
cons: Wrinkles from folding the cover take a long time to flatten out naturally

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit with Hubby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. He LOVED it. It was a little big for his 7' table, but he didn't mind. I was hesitant to order because of the negative reviews about fold creases, but we took a hair dryer and straightened them out within five minutes. This was a perfect fit for his "man cave". So glad I bought it. It was by far his most favorite Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great table cover
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty table cover. Packer logo looks great!!! Put in the sun for an hour. Packaging wrinkles come right out. I have a 7 ft. table. I have about 2" overhang on each end. Still looks great!!! GO PACK GO!
customer_reviews.author: Nautiboy22

customer_reviews.title: Wow fantastic product and in excellent shape!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching around online for this Chicago Bears pool table cover before I came across this one. This was the only one left and was "Used - Very Good" condition so I took a chance on it since it was a great price and these type of pool covers were out on other sites. Just got it today and although it was not in original packaging, it was packaged very nicely and when I unfolded it, I couldn't tell how it was considered "Used"... it looks brand new! Very happy with my purchase and cannot wait for my pool table to come in so I can use this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Aime A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: First time buying used from warehouse, said good condition and I've yet to find anything wrong with it all so it's perfect brand new condition which surprised me. I know it's for 8 foot tables but I just bought my husband a 7 foot Valley bar table for his birthday and they don't make 7 foot ones. It fits fine, just hangs over a little on each side. Really could care less about the creases people complained about.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany V Dolby

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail yesterday and couldnt wait to put it on. It has a very nice fit on my 8 foot pool table. Not too tight not too loose. Id say it fit mine just as the stock photo on here shows. Feels like its made out of really nice durable material and should last a very long time. It looks great and I couldnt be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Yela

customer_reviews.title: GO EAGLES!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for my 8ft. Table. The material is thicker and more durable than what I was expecting. It's a black artificial leather with my Philadelphia Eagles silk screened logo in the center. Over all, I am happy with the purchase on Amazon. IT was the cheapest price I could find for $79.99, but they did charge me like $5.00 tax , not sure why and received it in 3 days Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Tdoro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cover
customer_reviews.text: I just moved back to my hometown of Houston and being a Houston Texan fan, this was the perfect cover for a new pool table. Fits the 8 foot table perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Luter

customer_reviews.title: Great table cover!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty cover and it looks great. Yes is has the creases in it from it being folded up for shipping. However the creases are diminishing as time goes by. I may set it out in the sun one day when it warms up. Cover is actually too big for my table to fit tightly on the corners but that was my fault. My table is a 40”x80” tournament size table, not an 8’. Go Bears!!
customer_reviews.author: thomas Harders

customer_reviews.title: Yay for pool table cover!
customer_reviews.text: First off, great company! We received our cover promptly and well packaged. However, it came with a defect along one side where the stiching was noticeably crooked. They replaced it quickly! We get compliments or otherwise wise cracks about it, but people always notice it. It fits our 8ft table well, there's some room to spare but it doesn't look bad because of the way it has 2 lines of stiching around the edge. Anyway, it gave my underused fancy pool table a new life as a laundry folding station and we no longer have to nag our kids about keeping their grimy hands off!
customer_reviews.author: 3babiesmommy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this product. It is a nice addition but I guess we live with it.
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased the Cowboy pool table cover. Very nice product and looks great except the star has defect in the actual star. Looks like the paint is slowly coming out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Satisifed
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for Dad's pool table. He really likes it. He said he wishes it fit better along the sides but all in all it is easy to remove to play a quick game. We are hoping that the wrinkles will eventually straighten themselves out.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDi

customer_reviews.title: Like the cover so far...
customer_reviews.text: Good deal so far, I have this cover on my pool table outside and holding going up well so far in the sun and in the rain and it has been about a month or 2 since I bought this cover. The weight of the cover is about medium grade to a little heavier material, and feels appropriate to hold down the weight of the cover against the wind, especially with the wrapped corners that hang down about an inch over the bottom side of the hip rails. So far very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: RedspawnSilver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover used from Amazon, and its basically flawless. Im very happy with this cover and the deal. Fits my 8ft table like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE MENDOZA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Thick Cover
customer_reviews.text: Thicker than expected. Will protect pool table nicely and with style. Perfect fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: wtrgrl

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality.
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits perfect and looks great. High quality material. I would recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Stig

customer_reviews.title: Nice but slightly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, durable and nice feel. I think it is a bit overpriced, the logo is beautiful however I don’t think it’s worth paying an additional $40
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my father in law ! He loves it and fits his pool table..
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my 7ft table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cover! I would recommend letting it sit outside for the day b4 use, the material is quite stinky from being sealed. ZERO complaints. Would be even nicer if the Saints stop getting screwed every year...lol
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have a Silver and Blue felt pool table as I was going for a Cowboys theme. This fits perfect evern though mine is kinda of an oversized 8 footer, it barely just fit..a little snug but my table is one bulkier than most. Looks great, smells like plastic but i'm sure that will go away with time.
customer_reviews.author: RepresentTexas

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and seems durable!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my pool table when I am not using it and offers good protection, doesn’t feel flimsy. My table is indoors so I can’t comment on protection for those that use it on their patio where it might encounter the elements.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, no issues. Yes it has the fold marks but it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe F. Bernet

customer_reviews.title: It is good heavy quality and fits the table great.
customer_reviews.text: Not the logo advertised? Logo is quite a bit smaller too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Style and Color
customer_reviews.text: The pool table cover is excellent. I received so many thumbs up. GO RAVENS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for Steeler Fan with a Pool Table
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my father as a gift at Christmas near time of purchase. It has protected his pool table and kept his basement Steeler Nation strong. It's a nice thick material whose dimensions fit exactly as it was supposed to. 10/10 would purchase again if needed.

customer_reviews.title: Great Table Cover
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I opened the package as this is a really heavy duty well made pool table cover for the price. I am extremely happy.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my brother, he loves it, only problem is it does not have a way to stick to table, like having a bottom that will cling to table, so it's easy to slide off. But works good, looks nice.

customer_reviews.title: would Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and they loved it. Nice Quality and looks like it will last a long time. Fits Perfect. Only thing I would change is to make the Logo bigger. Would buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool table cover for the boyfriend. He's die hard viking fan. The look on his face when he unboxed it and covered his pool table with it was priceless. I would buy all over all just to see that look on his face.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly. thick material, should be sturdy. I like it.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cover
customer_reviews.text: This pool table cover is excellent quality and fits our pool table perfectly! We are very pleased and would highly recommend to friends.

customer_reviews.text: Received timely in good stated condition. Was a bit disappointed that the emblem is not very big. It seems smaller than the picture shows.

customer_reviews.title: Best pool table cover.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. Worth the price. Fits my 8 ft pool table perfectly. It’s thick and heavy and has my favorite football team logo to boot. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: New Orleans Saints Pool Table Cover.
customer_reviews.text: We love our Saints and what a great way to show it. The cover is heavy duty and the Saints decal is exactly centered. One prior comment mentioned that the decal could be larger, however I like the size. Large might be a little too much!
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: It looks pretty bad. Again
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open the pool table cover and should have. The star in the middle has scratches on it. It looks pretty bad. Again, it was a Christmas gift and the recipient wasn't bothered too much by the scratches. Otherwise, it's made pretty well and looks good on the pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey L Keitz

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: It was a very nice cover but did not fit our 8ft slate pool table. We had to sell it.

customer_reviews.title: This looks awesome on my pool table in my man cave.

customer_reviews.title: Love it looks great in the GameRoom

customer_reviews.title: Man Cave WIN
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and my father absolutely loves it. It is great quality, large enough to sufficiently cover my fathers pub-style billiards table and the logo looks great.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my Dad and he loves it! The only thing he was unhappy about was that he thought he was getting the Browns helmet with the "Cleveland Browns" written underneath (as shown in the advertised picture), but it only included the helmet.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for a Forty Niner fan
customer_reviews.text: First received was a Dallas Cowboys. Not good for a Forty Niner fan. Great exchange. It's a little large for his size table but he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than expected fits the table loose I have to reposition it all the time. My hubby has a Serious Raider Man Cave everyone that sees it thinks it's great

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it's not defective
customer_reviews.text: The cover is beautiful but it had a large cut/tear on it when I opened it to put it on my pool table. I bought it for my husbands bday but was moving t the time so just opened it in March so now I'm stuck with the cut/torn cover.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: For the price paid for this item, there should not be a “shadow” behind the graphic. This makes the cover look very cheap

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase

customer_reviews.title: Table Cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a good table cover. It fits my 8 foot table just fine and to prove I'm not paid to give a 5 star rating I will add that I hate the Packers. The cover is of quality material and I have had no issues in the past 6 months I have owned it. I only got the Packers logo because my husband is a fan and it was a gift for him. It keeps the table free from debris that fall from our garage. Other than the Packers logo I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyme

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous ordering this but I am glad that I did. It very easily fit onto our 8' pool table with some room to spare. The quality of the cover is very nice too. I suppose I don't have anything to compare it to but for our needs this seems to be a very durable cover. It is not just a thin sheet of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: bubs

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in good condition, size was fine. A bit thinner than expected but still very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Covers pool table with some extra overhang. Husband loved it!

customer_reviews.title: The logo was smaller but it had the name Patriots above it which we liked as well
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about this product is the picture didn't exactly match what we received. The logo was smaller but it had the name Patriots above it which we liked as well.

customer_reviews.title: Classy Cover!

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality than expected

I was extremely impressed with the quality of the product. It looks like a real leather cover and my sister is thrilled. Based on the quality, I expect it to last a very long time although I hope to upgrade her to a Steelers cover soon!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great but too small for 8.5' table

I would definitely recommend this cover or one like it if you don't have a cover or if you are just looking to switch things up of personalize a little more.

product_meta.title: Imperial Officially Licensed NFL Merchandise: Billiard/Pool Table Naugahyde Cover
product_meta.description: Officially licensed merchandise by the National Football League, the Imperial billiard/pool table naugahyde cover lets you take your game to the next level. The fitted style of this covering provides protection for the top playing surface and the side table aprons. It safeguards against spills, dust, dirt and pets from damaging your billiard table. High quality naugahyde is extremely durable, capable of withstanding much more abuse than vinyl covers. Measuring 100" L x 56" W x 8" D, this cover is designed to fit 8 foot tables. A silk screened team logo is prominently displayed in the center of the billiard table cover.
feature_bullets: Take your game to the next level with the officially licensed NFL billiard/pool table naugahyde cover
Fitted style of this covering provides protection for the top playing surface and the side table aprons
Safeguards against spills, dust, dirt and pets from damaging your billiard table
High quality naugahyde is extremely durable, capable of withstanding much more abuse than vinyl covers
Measuring 100" L x 56" W x 8" D, this cover is designed to fit 8 foot tables; Silk screened team logo is prominently displayed in the center
